title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: 1. Familiarisation with power electronic components2. Single-phase full and half controlled converters3. Three-phase full and half controlled converters4. Basic non-isolated DC to DC converters5. Basic isolated DC to DC converter6. Single and two quadrant choppers.7. Three-phase PWM voltage source inverter8. Speed control of DC motor9. Familiarisation with three phase variable frequency drive10. Mini project
